Mesmerize.help: The Snake painfully enraptures your mind with psychic energy rendering you unconscious.
Mesmerize.targetHelp: The Snake painfully enraptures your mind with psychic energy rendering you unconscious.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage.

Mass_Hypnosis.help: The Snake has hypnotized you. You are helpless for a while, unless something snaps you out of it.
Mass_Hypnosis.targetHelp: The Snake has hypnotized you. You are helpless for a while, unless something snaps you out of it.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage.

Dominate.help: Psychic energy tears at your mind rendering you helpless, lost in your own mind and unable to defend yourself.
Dominate.targetHelp: Psychic energy tears at your mind rendering you helpless, lost in your own mind and unable to defend yourself.

Venomous_Spray.help: The Snake sprays toxic venom all over you.

Venomous_Spit.help: The Snake spits a burning poison that deals Toxic damage over time.

Dreadful_Wail.help: Your Dreadful Wail is so strong that most foes will be defeated by being subjected to it. Dreadful Wail deals massive damage to all nearby foes, although the damage does vary. Activating this power leaves you drained of Endurance, and unable to recover Endurance for a while. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Very Long
Dreadful_Wail.targetHelp: You have been Disoriented and your resistance to damage has been decreased.
